BSCCO - Lightning Network Superconductor

About BSCCO, a tool allowing LN node operators to implement non-HTLC mechanisms for channels

Home Roadmap About Archive 日本語

About

BSCCO is a c-lightning plugin that allows users to designate custom logic for each channel, replacing HTLCs with a settlement mechanism of their choice. Only recommended for use with trusted peers.
